LanguageData.AT_Setting_ShowOriginal: Hover to show some original text (default: X):
LanguageData.AT_Setting_ShowOriginal_Tooltip: Hovering the mouse over a translation will display the original text. However, due to limitations of the system, not all translations are supported.
LanguageData.AT_Setting_Note: Note: The settings below require a restart
LanguageData.AT_Setting_RequiresAPIKey: Using this translation engine requires an API Key.
LanguageData.AT_Setting_RequiresAPIKey_Tooltip: To use multiple API keys in rotation, enter them separated by ',' characters.
LanguageData.AT_Message_LanguageNotSupported: This translator does not support your language! Please use another one.
LanguageData.AT_Setting_NoModelFound: No model found! Please check your api key.
LanguageData.AT_Setting_ResetDefCache: Reset all Def cache data (If some defs are not translated)
LanguageData.AT_Status1: The translation is still in progress. However, you can play the game as usual.
LanguageData.AT_Status2: The translation is complete! However, it is recommended to 'Reset all Def cache data' or relaunch for full application.
LanguageData.AT_Setting_OpenDir: Open the folder where the translation caches are stored
LanguageData.AT_Setting_WhiteList: Select mods to translate (applied in real-time)
LanguageData.AT_Message_ResetTranslationCache: The translation caches are deleted, please restart the game to start the translation again.
LanguageData.AT_Message_WhiteList_Failed: The translation is still in progress and will not be applied in real-time. You will need to retry after the translation is complete, or restart the game, for the changes to take effect.
LanguageData.AT_Message_TestFailed: The test failed, maybe API request limit reached. Or please check your model and API key again.
LanguageData.AT_Setting_RestartWork: Restart translation with current translator settings
LanguageData.AT_Message_RestartWork: Restart the translation operation... (to completely redo it, delete the translation data as well, then restart)
LanguageData.AT_Message_RestartFailed: The restart failed, please check your model and API key again.
LanguageData.AT_Message_FailedToGetModels: Failed to get models, please check your API key:
